column1: '''''SEVEN''''', '''Volume 25''' is a volume of ''[[SEVEN]]'', a scholarly journal published by the [[Marion E. Wade Center]].
*"A Myth of Hubris in ''Till We Have Faces''"
**by Stephen Thorson, Norbert Feinendegen, and Charlie Starr
